## Instructions

- Install this table through the Table Manager, using the `Add Table` > `Wizard` page
- If you need help, more information can be found on the wiki: [Table Manager ‚Äê Wizard](https://github.com/LegendsUnchained/vpx-standalone-alp4k/wiki/%5B03%5D-%F0%9F%92%9A-Table-Manager-%E2%80%90-Wizard)
- If the table requires any additional files/steps, click `GO TO TABLE` after adding, and the TM will open to the relevant table folder.

- "You're gonna need a bigger boat."
